_header: After the Friday that God was dead
_description: ‘How God delyuered Ioseph of aramathie out of prisoun’ — a couplet version of a portion of 833

BLAdd39996.First Lines:
After þe friday þat god was dedeAnd his body in sepulcre
                    leide…
BLAdd39996.Last Lines:
…How þe vernycle by goddes graceInto Rome broght
                    was
